nodes.text: Tatrang III was a poisonous jungle planet with three moons that was located within the Tatrang system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Tammuz sector. It occupied the third closest orbit around the system's star, the red giant Tatrang. The planet was uninhabitable and considered to be commercially worthless.

Tatrang III was first mentioned in the 1992 sourcebook Planets of the Galaxy, Volume Two, which was written by John Terra for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Tatrang system, and therefore Tatrang III, in grid square U-14.
